predicate.note: Frames file for 'retest' based transformation of 'test'. No actual examination of corpus.

roleset.name: check (for), examine (again)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: A Toto spokesman said the toilet not only retests blood pressure, pulse and urine, it also stores the data for up to 130 days.
example.note: I would love to see the rest of the context here.

example.name: all args
example.text: John retested Mary for violent tendencies.

roleset.note: I don't know that arg2 will ever actually appear.
